text:
Complex nested locks cases don't work properly, so there are issues with 
collection locks.
creator: remm@apache.org
remm@apache.org
text:
Proper collection lock handling is very complex and isn't implemented correctly 
in Tomcat 4.0.
Simple locking works fine, OTOH.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This is too complex to implement properly (only a handful of WebDAV
implementations properly implement locking). WebDAV level 1 support will be
advertised.
Slide will provide more complete WebDAV support.
